subject: Partnership Proposal – Jami Heiman
description_text:
Hello,

My name is Jami Heiman, a karting driver from Finland. I have been involved
in karting for 16 years, and my achievements include:

- 2 Finnish Karting Association Championships
- X30 Series Championship
- Several regional titles
- X30 ranking #1 in 2016

During the winter season, I compete in the iRacing series, where my goal is
to achieve a national championship title.

I am particularly interested in SIMSONN products, as they offer excellent
quality and value for money. I believe that Finland would be an ideal
market for SIMSONN — Finnish consumers are known for valuing durability and
smart spending.

I would like to offer you an opportunity to partner with me for the 2026
season, where SIMSONN would support my racing career. In return, I can
provide brand visibility in both the karting and simracing communities:

Karting races attract 100–200 competitors and an audience of 4,000–6,000
viewers (on-site and via YouTube live streams).

My iRacing series videos receive an average of around 1,000 views per race.

I believe that our partnership would bring mutual benefits: your brand
would gain exposure in both the karting and simracing communities, while I
would gain the opportunity to continue developing my career as a
competitive driver.

I would be happy to discuss in more detail what I can offer as part of this
collaboration.

Best regards,
Jami Heiman
? jamiheiman74@gmail.com
Instagram: Jami Heiman
Facebook: Jami Heiman official
